title: Do people gank Ahri just to hear her death sound?

replies.body: I gank Teemo because I feel good when I see his dead body. I feel, peace in my mind.

> [{quoted}](name=Zeppelins circus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AieArNJZ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-09-10T22:57:32.339+0000)
>
> I gank Teemo because I feel good when I see his dead body. I feel, peace in my mind.

I like ppl like u. It's ppl like u that still give me hope for humanity {{sticker:poppy-wink}}

> [{quoted}](name=Zeppelins circus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AieArNJZ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-09-10T22:57:32.339+0000)
>
> I gank Teemo because I feel good when I see his dead body. I feel, peace in my mind.

Yeah except how a gank against teemo usually goes. 

Me: ok he is pushed too far (proceeds to walk up)
Shroom 1: haha nah bra
Shroom 2: Bit** you though
Shroom 3: turn around
Me: now sees enemy jungler and I am on <30% HP F*** me

> [{quoted}](name=LeftyRaydy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AieArNJZ,comment-id=00020002,timestamp=2018-09-11T16:55:17.261+0000)
>
> Yeah except how a gank against teemo usually goes. 
> 
> Me: ok he is pushed too far (proceeds to walk up)
> Shroom 1: haha nah bra
> Shroom 2: Bit** you though
> Shroom 3: turn around
> Me: now sees enemy jungler and I am on <30% HP F*** me

Or I have a pinkward and make his traps non-existant,
So in this imaginary scenario teemo is just standing still and letting you pink ward his shrooms?

> [{quoted}](name=LeftyRaydy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AieArNJZ,comment-id=0002000200000000,timestamp=2018-09-11T18:04:29.733+0000)
>
> So in this imaginary scenario teemo is just standing still and letting you pink ward his shrooms?

You said yourself in this "imaginary" situation he is pushed too far,I pinkward, negate his traps and my laner engages on him and sandwitches him. easy job.

> [{quoted}](name=Zeppelins circus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AieArNJZ,comment-id=00020002000000000000,timestamp=2018-09-11T23:07:02.309+0000)
>
> You said yourself in this "imaginary" situation he is pushed too far,I pinkward, negate his traps and my laner engages on him and sandwitches him. easy job.

Ha Ill give this to you. I surrender.
The real pros jungle Fizz against Teemo, because the shark devours his body and leaves nothing behind. *taps head*
I mean they sure as hell don't do it expecting to get a kill.
I have strong muslim valus. No haram in my muslim boards pls.

I don't know about other mid laners but I'll just pick {{champion:134}} to roflstomp her ass into oblivion {{sticker:sg-syndra}} 

GGEZ

Implying Ahri actually dies when you gank her. 

*Dash. Dash. Dash*

> [{quoted}](name=The Yetii Rider,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AieArNJZ,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-09-11T15:03:04.612+0000)
>
> Implying Ahri actually dies when you gank her. 
> 
> *Dash. Dash. Dash*

It is more satisfying when she resists ;-)
